thread.title: Dorsey Launches New Website Emphasizing Client Successes
thread.title_full: Dorsey Launches New Website Emphasizing Client Successes

author: admin
title: Dorsey Launches New Website Emphasizing Client Successes
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Dorsey & Whitney LLP 
MINNEAPOLIS -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- International law firm Dorsey & Whitney LLP announced today the launch of its redesigned website at www.dorsey.com . The new site highlights the successes clients have achieved around the world benefiting from Dorsey’s deep experience in key industries and the breadth of its practice capabilities. 
“Law firm websites have traditionally been all about the lawyers and their achievements,” noted Dorsey Managing Partner Ken Cutler. “Our new site is about our clients and the successes they have achieved with our help. We have replaced the traditional walls of words with text that is clear and concise and made important information more accessible.” 
One of the new features of the site is a Client Achievements section that describes successes Dorsey clients have achieved across a wide range of industries, including six key industries in which Dorsey has formed Industry Groups to enhance collaboration across geographies and practices: Banking, Energy, Food & Agribusiness, Health Care, Mining & Natural Resources and Public-Private Project Development or P3D. 
The new site is fully responsive – adapting to all types of devices from computers to tablets to smart phones. 
“Our goal is to provide clients in all industries the critical advantage and edge they need to outperform their competition, achieve growth goals, manage and capitalize on change and protect the value of their enterprise,” added Mr. Cutler. “Our new website helps convey how we do that and the advantages of working with Dorsey.” 
About Dorsey & Whitney LLP Clients have relied on Dorsey since 1912 as a valued business partner. With locations across the United States and in Canada, Europe and the Asia-Pacific region, Dorsey provides an integrated, proactive approach to its clients' legal and business needs. Dorsey represents a number of the world's most successful companies from a wide range of industries, including leaders in the banking, energy, food and agribusiness, health care, mining and natural resources, and public-private project development sectors, as well as major non-profit and government entities.
